name: EAS Flight Training - Fayetteville
about: EAS Flight Training, located at Drake Field in Fayetteville, Arkansas, is a comprehensive FAA Part 61 flight training center. Established to serve aspiring pilots in the Northwest Arkansas area, EAS offers a full range of flight training programs, from private pilot certification to certified flight instructor (CFI) training. With state-of-the-art facilities and a dedicated team of instructors, EAS provides safe and effective training in various aircraft, including single-engine and multi-engine planes. As an FAA-certified written testing center, EAS also administers FAA and FCC tests. The school is committed to ensuring all students receive personalized attention and top-notch instruction to achieve their aviation goals. EAS Flight Training is your trusted partner in becoming a skilled and certified pilot.
